metadata.title: CVE-2022-34666 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer, where a local user with basic capabilities can causea null-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
